name: RetrieveTeamComponents
description:
Retrieve a list of published components in a team library.

Call this tool to obtain a paginated list of components that have been published within a specific team's library on Figma.

parameters.name: team_identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the team from which to list components. Required to specify the team's library.

value_schema.description: Id of the team to list components from.

parameters.name: number_of_items_to_return
parameters.description: Number of items to return in the paginated response. Defaults to 30. Maximum of 1000.

value_schema.description: Number of items to return in a paged list of results. Defaults to 30. Maximum of 1000.

parameters.name: retrieve_after_cursor
parameters.description: The cursor indicating the ID after which to start retrieving components. This is exclusive with the 'before' parameter.

value_schema.description: Cursor indicating which id after which to start retrieving components for. Exclusive with before. The cursor value is an internally tracked integer that doesn't correspond to any Ids.

parameters.name: cursor_before_id
parameters.description: An integer cursor indicating the id before which to start retrieving components. This is exclusive with `cursor_after_id`.

value_schema.description: Cursor indicating which id before which to start retrieving components for. Exclusive with after. The cursor value is an internally tracked integer that doesn't correspond to any Ids.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the figma API.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Number of items to return in a paged list of results. Defaults to 30. Maximum of 1000.

value_schema.description: Number of items to return in a paged list of results. Defaults to 30. Maximum of 1000.

parameters.name: after
parameters.description: Cursor indicating which id after which to start retrieving components for. Exclusive with before. The cursor value is an internally tracked integer that doesn't correspond to any Ids.

value_schema.description: Cursor indicating which id after which to start retrieving components for. Exclusive with before. The cursor value is an internally tracked integer that doesn't correspond to any Ids.

parameters.name: before
parameters.description: Cursor indicating which id before which to start retrieving components for. Exclusive with after. The cursor value is an internally tracked integer that doesn't correspond to any Ids.

value_schema.description: Cursor indicating which id before which to start retrieving components for. Exclusive with after. The cursor value is an internally tracked integer that doesn't correspond to any Ids.

parameters.name: team_id
parameters.description: Id of the team to list components from.

value_schema.description: Id of the team to list components from.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
